summary: Feature request to add support for schedule search attribute updates in the PHP SDK, following the pattern established in the Go SDK and tracked in the cross-SDK features repository.
userImpact: Users of the PHP SDK cannot update search attributes on schedules, limiting their ability to organize and query scheduled workflows.
proposedFix: Implement schedule search attribute update support following the Go SDK implementation pattern
resolutionDetails: Feature implemented to support schedule search attribute updates in PHP SDK
